title: Covid-19 Tracker
text: Program that texts recipients about the daily number of cases, deaths, death rate, and increase in cases from the day before.

title: Meke
alt: Picture of Meke's addition skill being played
text: Meke is an app designed to help students in elementary school learn math in a fun and engaging way.

title: MaskUp
alt: Picture of MaskUp's live detection feature.
text: MaskUp allows stores and organizations to check the mask status of their users. Features include a login system, live & group mask detection, symptom checking, and data visualization statistics.

title: Weathery
alt: Picture of the homepage of Weathery.
text: A clean and easy-to-use weather website. No ads, no spam, just current and hourly weather forecasts.

title: Focale
alt: Picture of the Focale chrome extension popup
text: Focale is a chrome extension designed to help students time and pace their studies efficiently.

title: Spotion
text: An intelligent web app that allows you to take a live picture and get back a playlist and song recommendation based on your detected emotion.

title: LiveTranslate
text: A web app that makes translation easier. Live Translate can translate from English into 6 different languages, in real time!
